# solana_slot_leaders (Data Source)

[(JSON RPC)](https://solana.com/docs/rpc/http/getslotleaders) Get the list of current slot leader addresses.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "solana_slot_leaders" "leaders" {
  start_slot = 12345
  limit = 5
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **limit** (Number) The number of slot leaders to get from the starting slot (between 1 - 5,000).
- **start_slot** (Number) The starting slot number for the query.

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **leaders** (List of String) The list of slot leader addresses found.
